about_the_game:
This walking simulator is a tool that makes it easy to get exercise and lose weight at home.

Information such as calories burned, distance walked, elapsed time, number of scenes, and rate of progress is displayed in real time while walking, making it easy to maintain motivation.

How to play

Stand in front of the computer and click on the play time to start. With the scenery flowing and the sound of footsteps echoing, begin the foot-stomping exercise.

You may find the exercise more comfortable if you lay a mat under your feet.

Perform the foot stomping while swinging your arms firmly, and it may feel a little hard at first.

However, as you continue, your body will become accustomed to the exercise and you will gradually begin to enjoy walking.

Eventually, you will feel a sense of exhilaration and hope.

Motivation for Development

I had been suffering from a lack of exercise and an inability to maintain a diet, and I decided to develop this simulator because I thought it would help me overcome these problems by making it easy for me to walk at home.

This simulator is the perfect tool to execute my own ideal walking exercise.

Currently, I continue to train with this simulator every day to promote my health.

Night Terror Mode.

When you select [Night Terror Mode], a scene with an eerie nighttime atmosphere is played back.

This mode is perfect for those who want to enjoy a slightly thrilling night walk.

[Enjoying Nature]

While the video progresses in real time, you can enjoy the changes in time zones such as day, evening, and night.

Fourteen different beautiful nature scenes unfold, providing a motivating element during the walk that makes it easy to continue.

name: Walking with Diet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11,10,8.1,8,7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615 Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
